value:
Look at all these beautiful flowers! I
can't help but smile when
surrounded by so many colors.

Well, first, I want to show my love
for my siblings. Then Maribelle, and
Frederick, and... whew, so many!

I won't be playing any pranks today.
Promise. Really! This is a day to show
gratitude to everyone, not mischief!

Owain! You're taking part in the
festival too? Oh, stop your posing
and help me deliver gifts to people.

I just love wearing these cute clothes!
If it were up to me, I'd celebrate the
Day of Devotion every day!

Guess what I have? No, it isn't a frog!
This is a Day of Devotion present for
you from $Nf!

Yay! I can shine even during the
Day of Devotion festival!

I hope I can show just how much I
appreciate everyone close to me!

Hmm... Maybe I'm just not showing
enough gratitude yet?

With this, maybe I can be a noble
lady...one capable of discussing love!
...Are you laughing?

I'm Lissa, a princess of Ylisse! Is this
where the Day of Devotion festival is?
I need to show my gratitude!

I wanted to thank you for inviting me
to the Day of Devotion. This is the
loveliest festival I've ever been to.$k$pAll these flowers, everyone smiling...
it was such a fun time. It made my
brother really happy too!$k$pI learned that rather than focusing on
those you dislike, it's best to show
gratitude to those you care about.$k$pI just hope this war ends quickly.
Then we can really focus on caring
for our favorite people...and flowers!$k$pI wish you and my brother the best of
luck. I'm sure that, together, you can
help bring that happy time about.$k$pJust as importantly, I really think that
this festival brought me one step
closer to becoming a true lady.$k$pHey...why are you laughing? I'm being
serious!
やあっ
あげる！
ひゃあっ
んもー！
Thanks for everything!
I'll show you how you matter!
Oooh, look at all the flowers!
I got this for you!
Wha... Why...?
Hm?
Come on, you can do it!
Here, just for you!
There are so many people I'm grateful to… Who to start with?
*surprise* Hey! I'm dressed up like a proper lady, so no pranks today, OK?
*inhale* Mmm, these flowers smell so good! I really hope my sister likes them...
Wouldn't it be nice if everyone could always show how much they appreciated others? Just like we're doing right now!
I know how hard you always work, so... Thank you!
Of course!
What's the plan?
And I'm off!
